headline: What to know about Netflix's downgrade & 'Sesame Street' addition
summary: Netflix (NFLX) is rebounding from earlier losses after being downgraded by JPMorgan analysts to Neutral from Overweight. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal joins Asking for a Trend with Josh Lipton to discuss Netflix's recent stock moves, as well as its plan to add "Sesame Street" to its streaming service later in the year. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.

headline: Netflix’s ‘Sesame Street’ deal is a PR coup for the ages
summary: Netflix saved the beloved children’s show from an uncertain fate in a way that creates goodwill for the company—and bad publicity for one of its rivals.

raw.headline: Netflix’s ‘Sesame Street’ deal is a PR coup for the ages
raw.summary: Netflix saved the beloved children’s show from an uncertain fate in a way that creates goodwill for the company—and bad publicity for one of its rivals.

headline: ‘Sesame Street’ Finds a New Home on Netflix
summary: The streaming giant has reached an agreement to broadcast new episodes of “Sesame Street,” giving the beloved children’s show a home after  Warner Bros. Discovery  said it was stepping away from the program.  Financial terms of the deal weren’t disclosed.  Sesame Workshop, the nonprofit organization that produces “Sesame Street,” said new episodes will also air on PBS stations and PBS Kids the same day they debut on Netflix.

headline: Nvidia, Qualcomm, Netflix: Trending Tickers
summary: At the 2025 Computex conference in Taiwan, Nvidia (NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang revealed the chipmaker's plans for humanoid robotics and its NVLink technology for building out customizable AI infrastructure. Qualcomm (QCOM) will be using Nvidia technology in its data center CPUs. Netflix stock (NFLX) has been downgraded to Neutral by JPMorgan analysts. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: NETFLIX COM INC : JP Morgan is less optimistic
summary: JP Morgan's analyst Douglas Anmuth is no longer positive. The broker's recommendation changes from Buy to Neutral. The target price is being increased from USD 1150 to USD 1220.
